column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Kim - Thanks for your feedback. I'm sorry you feel our restaurant is overrated. When it comes to our food
column3: but we would always hope to have the opportunity to offer something different if he or she doesn't fully enjoy our fare. We have more than a dozen different bowls of ramen
column4: each with a varied flavor profile based on the ingredients we add. Regardless
column5: we appreciate your giving us a try.
